programme.title: Bad Moon
programme.desc: Full, crescent, quarter... each is a Bad Moon for Ted Harrison. By day, he's a photojournalist By night, a werewolf.

programme.title: Hell Night
programme.desc: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.

programme.title: Itsy Bitsy
programme.desc: Based on the centuries old poem, a family moves into a secluded mansion where they soon find themselves being targeted by an entity taking the form of a giant spider.

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: A loser and his friend who work at a soulless telemarketing company discover their new boss is a vampire.

programme.title: Steve Niles' Remains
programme.desc: Set in a chilling postapocalyptic Reno, Remains follows the survivors of an accident that reduced most of the world's population to zombies.

programme.title: The Company of Wolves
programme.desc: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves.

programme.title: Caged
programme.desc: An African American male is imprisoned and placed in solitary confinement after being found guilty of murdering his wife, as he's haunted by internal demons and his dead wife, and pushed to the breaking point by an abusive female guard.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak. Shortly after her arrival a series of bizarre and violent "accidents" begin to claim the lives of various campers.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A struggling new father joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Meatcleaver Massacre
programme.desc: When a professor specializing in ancient rites and rituals is attacked and his family killed by four of his students, he summons an evil spirit to hunt down the attackers.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Brain that Wouldn't Die
programme.desc: Elvira prepares to compete on a game show while hosting "The Brain That Wouldn't Die."

programme.title: Brain Dead
programme.desc: In a showdown of man versus machine, Martin plunges into a chaotic nightmare trying to save his mind from the megalomaniacal corporation.

programme.title: Fade to Black
programme.desc: A shy, lonely film buff embarks on a killing spree against those who browbeat and betray him, all the while stalking his idol, a Marilyn Monroe lookalike.

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: Eight people have been invited to an island estate for the weekend. One of them is a werewolf. Can you guess which one?
